title: Deepash Shekhar Saini
text:
Dr. Deepash Shekhar Saini is currently working as an Assistant Professor at the Department of Physics, Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gorakhapur University, Gorakhapur U.P. India.
He completed his Ph.D degree from Materials Science Centre, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur, India in 2017. He received his Masters degree in Solid State Materials from Indian Institute of Technology Delhi, India in 2010. His research interests are synthesis and characterization of perovskite oxides as proton conducting electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs), thermoelectric materials and porous ceramic membranes.
